package.name: r_usbh0_hid
package.details: USBH0 driver Human Interface Device for FreeRTOS IMPORTANT NOTICE: (1)This driver doesn't work with OSless project at this moment. (2)When using this driver, change the settings of the following files. The folder with the .scfg file is the [project] folder. Path:project/generate/configuration/r_startup_config.h #define STARTUP_CFG_DISABLE_USB0 (1) ---> #define STARTUP_CFG_DISABLE_USB0 (0) #define STARTUP_CFG_DISABLE_USB1 (1) ---> #define STARTUP_CFG_DISABLE_USB1 (0)
